name: All-Star Baseball 2000
description:
Second Generation Hi Rez™ Graphics and 3-D Sports Engine

All New Player Models Feature Sunglasses, HIgh Socks, Alternate Jerseys

400 All-New Animations like Over the Shoulder Catches and the Double Play Pivot

Over 100 Unique Player Batting Stances and Real-Life Faces

Adjustable 3-D Icon for Total Batting Control

• All-new Instant Replay.
• Pitchers scouted by Yankees shortstop Derek Jeter.
• Variable Pitch Speed.
• The Yankees John Sterling and Michael Kay call the action.
• All 30 Major League™ teams, players and stadiums.
